name: Dwarven Pest Control
description:
Dwarven Pest Control is an action game created for Ludum Dare 44. 

______________________________________________________

Pick up your mighty hammer, use your dwarven strength to wield its might. Protect your underground sanctuary from the incoming swarm. 

____________________________________________________

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

C - Crouch

Shift - Run

LMB - use hammer

____________________________________________________

Music was created by : John Leonard French

______________________________________________________
